summary: Car shop app with loading screen, photo gallery of cars and engines, and purchase information with pricing
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Luxury sports car front view in showroom lighting, professional automotive photography style (car-1.dim_800x600.png)
- High-performance engine bay detail shot with chrome and metal components visible (engine-1.dim_800x600.png)
- Modern sedan side profile on clean white background (car-2.dim_800x600.png)
- V8 engine close-up showing mechanical details and polish (engine-2.dim_800x600.png)
- Classic muscle car three-quarter view in dramatic lighting (car-3.dim_800x600.png)
- Turbo engine cutaway showing internal components (engine-3.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Display a loading screen when the app first launches before showing the main content
Create a photo gallery displaying images of cars and car engines on the main screen
Display purchase information with 'Buy' text and price below each car photo in the gallery
Apply a cohesive automotive showroom design theme with premium styling, clean layout, and professional presentation suitable for a car dealership

new_feature_requests.summary: Photo gallery displaying cars and car engines
Display purchase option with pricing below photos
